scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -f libtpl.wasm trealla.js trealla.js.map index.d.ts index.d.ts.map dist/*
scripts.update: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd trealla && git fetch && git pull origin main
scripts.compile: cd trealla && make clean && make -j8 libtpl-js && mv libtpl-js.wasm ../libtpl.wasm
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec 'npm run build && cp dist/trealla.js example/browser/' --ignore 'example' --watch 'src' --watch 'libtpl.wasm' --ext ts,wasm
